Greetings.english: Good morning, how is it going?

Kitchen.spanish: Necesito un cuchillo para cortar el pan.
Kitchen.english: I need a knife to cut the bread.
I am going to cook dinner.

Work.spanish: Trabajo en una oficina en el centro.
Work.english: I work in an office downtown.

Work.spanish: Tengo una reunión a las tres.
Work.english: I have a meeting at three.

Work.spanish: Mi jefe envió un correo importante.
Work.english: My boss sent an important email.
We need to finish this project.

Family.spanish: Mi madre cocina una paella deliciosa.
Family.english: My mother cooks a delicious paella.

Family.spanish: Tengo dos hermanos y una hermana.
Family.english: I have two brothers and one sister.

Family.spanish: Visitamos a nuestros abuelos los domingos.
Family.english: We visit our grandparents on Sundays.

Economy.spanish: El precio de la gasolina sigue subiendo.
Economy.english: The price of gasoline keeps rising.

Economy.spanish: El gobierno anunció nuevas medidas económicas.
Economy.english: The government announced new economic measures.
It is important to save money.

Shopping.english: Can you help me find these shoes?

Shopping.spanish: Quiero pagar con tarjeta de crédito.
Shopping.english: I want to pay with a credit card.
How much does this shirt cost?

Shopping.spanish: Estamos buscando un regalo para mi padre.
Shopping.english: We are looking for a gift for my father.
I need to buy milk and bread.

Shopping.spanish: Hay una oferta especial en la tienda.
Shopping.english: There is a special offer in the store.
Do you have this dress in a small size?
I would like to try on these pants.

Shopping.spanish: La cajera me dio el recibo.
Shopping.english: The cashier gave me the receipt.

Shopping.spanish: El mercado abre a las nueve de la mañana.
Shopping.english: The market opens at nine in the morning.

Shopping.spanish: Compré muchas frutas y verduras frescas.
Shopping.english: I bought a lot of fresh fruits and vegetables.

Shopping.spanish: La tienda cierra a las ocho de la noche.
Shopping.english: The store closes at eight at night.

Shopping.spanish: Los precios de la ropa están rebajados.
Shopping.english: The prices of the clothes are reduced.

Travel.spanish: Quiero reservar un vuelo a Madrid.
Travel.english: I want to book a flight to Madrid.

Travel.spanish: Necesito un mapa de la ciudad.

Travel.english: I would like to rent a car.
What time does the bus leave?
I am lost, can you help me?

Travel.spanish: Visitamos muchos museos en la capital.
Travel.english: We visited many museums in the capital.

Travel.spanish: La playa es muy bonita en verano.
Travel.english: The beach is very beautiful in the summer.

Travel.spanish: Compré muchos recuerdos para mi familia.
Travel.english: I bought a lot of souvenirs for my family.

Travel.spanish: Prefiero viajar en tren en lugar de en avión.
Travel.english: I prefer to travel by train instead of by plane.
Where can I buy a ticket?

Travel.spanish: Me quedé en un hotel cerca del centro.
Travel.english: I stayed in a hotel near the center.

Travel.spanish: El viaje fue muy largo, pero valió la pena.
Travel.english: The trip was very long, but it was worth it.

Travel.spanish: Necesitamos pasaportes para cruzar la frontera.
Travel.english: We need passports to cross the border.

Travel.spanish: Volaremos a Barcelona en dos horas.
Travel.english: We will fly to Barcelona in two hours.

Hobbies.spanish: Me gusta leer libros de fantasía.
Hobbies.english: I like to read fantasy books.

Hobbies.spanish: Él toca la guitarra muy bien.
Hobbies.english: He plays the guitar very well.

Hobbies.spanish: Nosotros jugamos al fútbol todos los sábados.
Ella pinta hermosos cuadros al óleo.
Me encanta ir al cine los fines de semana.
Hobbies.english: I love going to the movies on weekends.

Hobbies.spanish: Ellos practican senderismo en las montañas.
Hobbies.english: They practice hiking in the mountains.

Hobbies.spanish: Mi hobby favorito es la jardinería.
Solemos correr en el parque por la mañana.
Hobbies.english: We usually run in the park in the morning.

Hobbies.spanish: Siempre he querido aprender a bailar salsa.
Hobbies.english: I've always wanted to learn to dance salsa.

Hobbies.spanish: Tejer es una actividad muy relajante para mí.
Hobbies.english: Knitting is a very relaxing activity for me.

Hobbies.spanish: Después del trabajo, me gusta escuchar música.
Hobbies.english: After work, I like to listen to music.

Hobbies.spanish: Ella colecciona monedas de diferentes países.
Hobbies.english: She collects coins from different countries.

Hobbies.spanish: Mi hermano y yo practicamos natación juntos.
Hobbies.english: My brother and I practice swimming together.
We have a lot of fun playing video games.

Hobbies.spanish: He empezado a aprender a cocinar.
Hobbies.english: I've started to learn how to cook.

verbs.conjugation: Present, 3rd person singular (used impersonally for weather)

Weather.spanish: Va a nevar mañana en las montañas.
Weather.english: It's going to snow tomorrow in the mountains.

Weather.spanish: El pronóstico dice que hará frío.
Weather.english: The forecast says it will be cold.
What's the weather like in your city?

Weather.spanish: El cielo está despejado y sin nubes.
Weather.english: The sky is clear and without clouds.
We feel the humidity of summer.

Weather.spanish: El sol se puso detrás de las colinas.
Weather.english: The sun set behind the hills.
There was a thunderstorm last night.

Weather.spanish: La niebla cubrió toda la ciudad.
Weather.english: The fog covered the entire city.

Weather.spanish: El viento sopló fuerte durante la noche.
Weather.english: The wind blew hard during the night.

Dining Out.spanish: Me gustaría pedir la sopa del día.
Dining Out.english: I would like to order the soup of the day.
What do you recommend for a main course?

Dining Out.spanish: Este restaurante tiene un ambiente muy agradable.
Dining Out.english: This restaurant has a very pleasant atmosphere.

Dining Out.spanish: El mesero nos trajo más pan.
Dining Out.english: The waiter brought us more bread.

Dining Out.spanish: Necesitamos hacer una reserva para mañana.
Dining Out.english: We need to make a reservation for tomorrow.

Dining Out.spanish: La comida estaba deliciosa, los felicito.
Quiero pagar con tarjeta, por favor.
Dining Out.english: I want to pay with a card, please.

Dining Out.spanish: Pedimos la ensalada de entrada y un filete de plato principal.
Dining Out.english: We ordered the salad as a starter and a steak as a main course.
What kind of wine do you have?

Dining Out.spanish: No puedo comer mariscos por mi alergia.
Dining Out.english: I can't eat shellfish because of my allergy.

Dining Out.spanish: Por favor, ¿me puede traer un vaso de agua?
Dining Out.english: Please, can you bring me a glass of water?

Dining Out.spanish: La carne estaba un poco cruda.
Dining Out.english: The meat was a little raw.

Dining Out.spanish: De postre, vamos a pedir el pastel de chocolate.
Dining Out.english: For dessert, we are going to order the chocolate cake.

Dining Out.spanish: El chef se esmeró en la presentación de los platos.
Dining Out.english: The chef took great care in the presentation of the dishes.

Household Chores.spanish: Tengo que limpiar la cocina después de cenar.
Household Chores.english: I have to clean the kitchen after dinner.

Household Chores.spanish: Él barre el piso de la sala de estar.
Household Chores.english: He sweeps the floor of the living room.

Household Chores.spanish: Necesitas poner la ropa en la lavadora.
Household Chores.english: You need to put the clothes in the washing machine.

Household Chores.spanish: Me toca a mí sacar la basura hoy.
Household Chores.english: It's my turn to take out the trash today.

Household Chores.spanish: Pasé la aspiradora por toda la casa.
Ella planchó todas las camisas ayer.
Household Chores.english: She ironed all the shirts yesterday.

Household Chores.spanish: Mi hermano se encarga de regar las plantas.
Household Chores.english: My brother is in charge of watering the plants.

Household Chores.spanish: Hay que lavar los platos a mano.
Household Chores.english: The dishes must be washed by hand.

Household Chores.spanish: Colgué la ropa en el tendedero.
Household Chores.english: I hung the clothes on the clothesline.

Household Chores.spanish: Por favor, dobla la ropa limpia.
Tenemos que cambiar las sábanas de la cama.
Household Chores.english: We have to change the bed sheets.

Household Chores.spanish: Limpié el baño de arriba a abajo.
Household Chores.english: I cleaned the bathroom from top to bottom.
The garden needs to be pruned.

Household Chores.spanish: Me encargué de ir a comprar comida.
Household Chores.english: I took care of going to buy food.

Household Chores.spanish: Ella quitó el polvo de los muebles.

Emotions.spanish: Me siento muy feliz de verte.
Emotions.english: I feel very happy to see you.

Emotions.spanish: Ella está triste porque su perro se enfermó.
Emotions.english: She is sad because her dog got sick.

Emotions.spanish: Él se enojó mucho con la noticia.
Emotions.english: He got very angry with the news.

Emotions.spanish: Nos sorprendimos con el regalo inesperado.
Emotions.english: We were surprised by the unexpected gift.

Emotions.spanish: Ellos están preocupados por el examen.
Emotions.english: They are worried about the exam.

Emotions.spanish: Me da vergüenza hablar en público.
Emotions.english: I am embarrassed to speak in public.

Emotions.spanish: Nos reímos mucho con esa película.
Emotions.english: We laughed a lot with that movie.

Emotions.spanish: El abuelo siempre se pone nostálgico al ver fotos antiguas.
Emotions.english: Grandpa always gets nostalgic when he sees old photos.

Emotions.spanish: Tuve un ataque de nervios cuando me enteré.
Emotions.english: I had a nervous breakdown when I found out.

Emotions.spanish: Ella se sintió aliviada al terminar el proyecto.
Emotions.english: She felt relieved when she finished the project.

Emotions.spanish: Me siento un poco decepcionado por el resultado.
Emotions.english: I feel a little disappointed with the result.
I was furious when I discovered it.
My heart is beating with excitement.

Physical Appearance.spanish: Tiene el pelo largo y rizado.
Él es alto y delgado, con ojos azules.
Physical Appearance.english: He is tall and thin, with blue eyes.

Physical Appearance.spanish: Mi hermana tiene una sonrisa muy bonita.
Physical Appearance.english: My sister has a very beautiful smile.

Physical Appearance.spanish: El hombre que vimos llevaba bigote.
Physical Appearance.english: The man we saw had a mustache.

Physical Appearance.spanish: Ella se tiñe el pelo de rubio.

Physical Appearance.english: I have freckles on my face.

Physical Appearance.spanish: Mi padre se está quedando calvo.
Se hizo un tatuaje en el brazo.
Physical Appearance.english: She got a tattoo on her arm.

Physical Appearance.spanish: Tengo una cicatriz en la rodilla.
Physical Appearance.english: I have a scar on my knee.

Physical Appearance.spanish: Siempre lleva maquillaje en los ojos.

Health.spanish: Me duele la cabeza, necesito tomar una pastilla.
Health.english: My head hurts, I need to take a pill.
I have a cold and a cough.

Health.spanish: El doctor me recomendó hacer más ejercicio.
Health.english: The doctor recommended I exercise more.

Health.spanish: Tengo que ir a la farmacia a comprar medicinas.
Health.english: I have to go to the pharmacy to buy medicine.

Health.spanish: Me rompí el brazo jugando al tenis.
Health.english: I broke my arm playing tennis.

Health.spanish: Es importante beber mucha agua para mantenerse hidratado.
Health.english: It is important to drink a lot of water to stay hydrated.

Health.spanish: Necesito una cita con el dentista.
Health.english: I need an appointment with the dentist.

Health.spanish: Siento un dolor agudo en la espalda.
Health.english: I feel a sharp pain in my back.

Health.spanish: Tienes que tomarte este jarabe tres veces al día.
Health.english: You have to take this syrup three times a day.

Health.spanish: Me hicieron un chequeo médico completo.
Health.english: They gave me a complete medical check-up.

Health.spanish: La enfermera me puso una inyección.
Health.english: The nurse gave me an injection.

Health.spanish: Ella se desmayó por el calor.
La operación fue un éxito, se recupera bien.
Health.english: The operation was a success, she is recovering well.

Health.spanish: Voy al gimnasio para mantenerme en forma.
Health.english: I go to the gym to stay in shape.

Health.spanish: Es crucial tener una dieta equilibrada.
Health.english: It is crucial to have a balanced diet.

Art.spanish: Me encanta la pintura renacentista italiana.
El museo de arte moderno expone obras de Picasso.
Art.english: The modern art museum exhibits works by Picasso.

Art.spanish: Visitamos el Museo del Prado en Madrid.
Art.english: We visited the Prado Museum in Madrid.

Art.spanish: Ella es una artista muy talentosa.
Art.english: She is a very talented artist.

Art.spanish: Me gusta la escultura más que la pintura.
Art.english: I like sculpture more than painting.

Art.spanish: El cuadro fue pintado en el siglo XVII.
Art.english: The painting was painted in the 17th century.

Art.spanish: He leído un libro sobre la historia del arte.
Art.english: I have read a book about the history of art.

Art.spanish: El concierto de música clásica fue fascinante.
Art.english: The classical music concert was fascinating.

Art.spanish: La exposición de fotografía cierra la próxima semana.
Art.english: The photography exhibition closes next week.

Art.spanish: El artista se inspira en la naturaleza.
Art.english: The artist is inspired by nature.

Art.spanish: El director de orquesta dirigió la sinfonía con pasión.
Art.english: The conductor led the symphony with passion.

Art.spanish: La obra de teatro fue representada en un antiguo teatro.
Art.english: The play was performed in an old theater.
He wrote a very moving poem.

Art.spanish: La escultura de bronce está en la plaza central.
Art.english: The bronze sculpture is in the central square.

History.spanish: Estudiamos la historia de la civilización romana.
History.english: We are studying the history of Roman civilization.

History.spanish: La Segunda Guerra Mundial terminó en 1945.
History.english: The Second World War ended in 1945.

History.spanish: El Imperio Inca se extendía por los Andes.
History.english: The Inca Empire extended through the Andes.

History.spanish: La construcción de la Gran Muralla China duró siglos.
History.english: The construction of the Great Wall of China lasted for centuries.

History.spanish: El Renacimiento fue una época de gran cambio cultural.
History.english: The Renaissance was a time of great cultural change.

History.spanish: Los antiguos egipcios construyeron las pirámides.
History.english: The ancient Egyptians built the pyramids.

History.spanish: Napoleón Bonaparte conquistó gran parte de Europa.
History.english: Napoleon Bonaparte conquered a large part of Europe.

History.spanish: El descubrimiento de la penicilina cambió la medicina.
History.english: The discovery of penicillin changed medicine.

History.spanish: La invención de la imprenta revolucionó la comunicación.
History.english: The invention of the printing press revolutionized communication.

History.spanish: Los colonos llegaron a América en el siglo XVII.
History.english: The colonists arrived in America in the 17th century.

History.spanish: La Guerra Civil Española duró tres años.
History.english: The Spanish Civil War lasted three years.

History.spanish: Los romanos fundaron la ciudad hace dos mil años.
History.english: The Romans founded the city two thousand years ago.

History.spanish: Conocemos el pasado a través de la arqueología.
History.english: We know the past through archaeology.

Nature.spanish: El río fluye entre las montañas.
Nature.english: The river flows between the mountains.

Nature.spanish: Vimos un hermoso atardecer en la playa.
Nature.english: We saw a beautiful sunset on the beach.

Nature.spanish: Los pájaros cantan por la mañana.
Nature.english: The birds sing in the morning.

Nature.spanish: El bosque está lleno de árboles y plantas.
Nature.english: The forest is full of trees and plants.

Nature.spanish: Subimos a la cima del volcán.
Nature.english: We climbed to the top of the volcano.

Nature.spanish: Hay una cascada muy grande cerca de aquí.
Nature.english: There is a very large waterfall near here.

Nature.spanish: La luna brilla en la oscuridad.
Nature.english: The moon shines in the dark.

Nature.spanish: Las olas del mar rompen en la orilla.
Nature.english: The ocean waves break on the shore.

Nature.spanish: Fuimos a observar las estrellas al desierto.
Nature.english: We went to observe the stars in the desert.

Nature.spanish: La lluvia alimentó los campos secos.
Nature.english: The rain fed the dry fields.

Nature.spanish: El aire en el campo es muy puro.
Nature.english: The air in the countryside is very pure.

Nature.spanish: Caminamos por un sendero en el bosque.
Nature.english: We walked along a path in the forest.

Nature.spanish: El sol se levantó sobre el mar.
Nature.english: The sun rose over the sea.

Technology.spanish: Mi teléfono inteligente tiene una cámara muy buena.
Technology.english: My smartphone has a very good camera.

Technology.spanish: Necesito descargar una aplicación para este programa.
Technology.english: I need to download an app for this program.

Technology.spanish: Mandé un correo electrónico importante a mi jefe.
Technology.english: I sent an important email to my boss.

Technology.spanish: Navegué por internet para buscar información.
Technology.english: I surfed the internet to look for information.

Technology.spanish: El WiFi no funciona bien en esta zona.
Technology.english: The WiFi doesn't work well in this area.

Technology.spanish: Estoy escribiendo en mi computadora portátil.
Technology.english: I am typing on my laptop.

Technology.spanish: Ella subió una foto a sus redes sociales.
Technology.english: She uploaded a photo to her social media.

Technology.spanish: Vamos a ver una película en streaming.
Technology.english: We're going to watch a movie via streaming.

Technology.spanish: Mi impresora se quedó sin tinta.
Technology.english: My printer ran out of ink.

Technology.spanish: Estoy haciendo una copia de seguridad de mis archivos.
Technology.english: I am backing up my files.

Technology.spanish: Necesitas actualizar el software de tu computadora.
Technology.english: You need to update your computer's software.

Technology.spanish: El sitio web se cayó por un error.
Technology.english: The website crashed due to an error.

Technology.spanish: Usamos la tableta para leer las noticias.
Technology.english: We use the tablet to read the news.

Technology.spanish: La inteligencia artificial avanza muy rápido.
Technology.english: Artificial intelligence is advancing very quickly.

News & Current Events.spanish: El presidente dio un discurso ayer por la noche.
News & Current Events.english: The president gave a speech last night.

News & Current Events.spanish: Las protestas se extendieron por toda la ciudad.
News & Current Events.english: The protests spread throughout the city.

News & Current Events.spanish: El tratado de paz fue firmado por ambos países.
News & Current Events.english: The peace treaty was signed by both countries.

News & Current Events.spanish: El cambio climático es un problema global.
News & Current Events.english: Climate change is a global problem.

News & Current Events.spanish: Los periodistas informaron sobre el incidente.
News & Current Events.english: The journalists reported on the incident.

News & Current Events.spanish: El gobierno anunció nuevas leyes de inmigración.
News & Current Events.english: The government announced new immigration laws.

News & Current Events.spanish: Se descubrió una nueva especie de animal.
News & Current Events.english: A new species of animal was discovered.

News & Current Events.spanish: La bolsa de valores ha caído drásticamente.
News & Current Events.english: The stock market has fallen drastically.

News & Current Events.spanish: Los rescatistas encontraron a los sobrevivientes.
El huracán causó muchos daños en la costa.
News & Current Events.english: The hurricane caused a lot of damage on the coast.

News & Current Events.spanish: El candidato ganó las elecciones con una gran mayoría.
News & Current Events.english: The candidate won the elections with a large majority.

News & Current Events.spanish: Han surgido nuevas tensiones entre las dos naciones.
News & Current Events.english: New tensions have arisen between the two nations.

News & Current Events.spanish: Un meteorito cayó en el desierto.
News & Current Events.english: A meteorite fell in the desert.

News & Current Events.spanish: El actor fue arrestado por conducir ebrio.
News & Current Events.english: The actor was arrested for drunk driving.

News & Current Events.spanish: El descubrimiento de agua en Marte fue un hito.
News & Current Events.english: The discovery of water on Mars was a milestone.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si tuviera más tiempo, viajaría por el mundo.
Conditional Sentences.english: If I had more time, I would travel the world.
If you study, you will pass the exam.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si hubieras llegado a tiempo, habrías visto la película.
Conditional Sentences.english: If you had arrived on time, you would have seen the movie.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si hace buen tiempo, iremos a la playa.
Conditional Sentences.english: If the weather is good, we will go to the beach.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si pudiera, te ayudaría con tu tarea.
Conditional Sentences.english: If I could, I would help you with your homework.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si comes más verduras, te sentirás mejor.
Conditional Sentences.english: If you eat more vegetables, you will feel better.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si hubiéramos sabido, habríamos ido contigo.
Conditional Sentences.english: If we had known, we would have gone with you.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si te duele la garganta, bebe té con miel.
Conditional Sentences.english: If your throat hurts, drink tea with honey.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si ella no hubiera estudiado, no habría aprobado.
Conditional Sentences.english: If she hadn't studied, she wouldn't have passed.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si me lo pides, te lo daré.
Conditional Sentences.english: If you ask me for it, I will give it to you.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si ganara la lotería, compraría una isla.
Conditional Sentences.english: If I won the lottery, I would buy an island.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si él supiera la verdad, se enfadaría.
Conditional Sentences.english: If he knew the truth, he would get angry.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si llueve, no saldremos de casa.
Conditional Sentences.english: If it rains, we won't leave the house.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si yo fuera tú, aceptaría la oferta.
Conditional Sentences.english: If I were you, I would accept the offer.

Conditional Sentences.spanish: Si hubieras estudiado, tendrías un título.
Conditional Sentences.english: If you had studied, you would have a degree.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Espero que vengas a mi fiesta.
Subjunctive Mood.english: I hope that you come to my party.
I want you to listen to me.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Dudo que sea verdad lo que dice.
Subjunctive Mood.english: I doubt that what he says is true.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Busco un libro que hable de historia de España.
Subjunctive Mood.english: I'm looking for a book that talks about Spanish history.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: No creo que lleguen a tiempo.
Subjunctive Mood.english: I don't think they'll arrive on time.
I will tell you when I get back.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Es una lástima que no puedas venir.
Subjunctive Mood.english: It's a shame that you can't come.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Me alegro de que hayas aprobado.

Subjunctive Mood.english: I beg you to forgive me.
Even if it's difficult, we will try.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Para que entiendas, te lo explicaré de nuevo.
Subjunctive Mood.english: So that you understand, I will explain it to you again.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: No hay nadie aquí que hable francés.
Subjunctive Mood.english: There is no one here who speaks French.
I hope everything turns out well.
It is probable that it will rain tomorrow.

Subjunctive Mood.spanish: Necesito un empleado que sea muy responsable.
Subjunctive Mood.english: I need an employee who is very responsible.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Me lavo las manos antes de comer.
Reflexive Verbs.english: I wash my hands before eating.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Te vistes muy rápido por las mañanas.
Reflexive Verbs.english: You get dressed very quickly in the mornings.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Se duchan con agua fría para despertarse.
Reflexive Verbs.english: They shower with cold water to wake up.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Nosotros nos cepillamos los dientes después de cada comida.
Reflexive Verbs.english: We brush our teeth after every meal.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Ellos se divirtieron mucho en la fiesta.
Reflexive Verbs.english: They had a lot of fun at the party.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Me acuesto tarde los fines de semana.
Reflexive Verbs.english: I go to bed late on weekends.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Se levantó temprano para ir a trabajar.
Reflexive Verbs.english: He/She got up early to go to work.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Nosotros nos preparamos para salir de viaje.
Reflexive Verbs.english: We are getting ready to go on a trip.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Te preocupas demasiado por cosas pequeñas.
Reflexive Verbs.english: You worry too much about small things.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Ella se maquilla antes de salir.
Reflexive Verbs.english: She puts on makeup before leaving.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Me puse muy nerviosa durante la entrevista.
Reflexive Verbs.english: I got very nervous during the interview.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Se acordaron de llamarnos al llegar.
Reflexive Verbs.english: They remembered to call us upon arriving.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Nos encontramos con un viejo amigo por casualidad.
Reflexive Verbs.english: We ran into an old friend by chance.

Reflexive Verbs.spanish: Se cayeron los libros de la mesa.
Reflexive Verbs.english: The books fell off the table.

Idioms.spanish: No hay mal que por bien no venga.
Idioms.english: Every cloud has a silver lining.
What's done is done. (Face the consequences)

Idioms.spanish: Tira la casa por la ventana.
Idioms.english: To spare no expense. (Literally: Throw the house out the window)
To have one's head in the clouds.
He who doesn't run, flies. (Seize the opportunity)

Idioms.spanish: Hablando del rey de Roma, por la puerta asoma.

Idioms.english: To hit the nail on the head.
To be a piece of cake.

Idioms.spanish: No tener pelos en la lengua.

Idioms.english: To be crazy. (Literally: To be like a goat)
To go to hell in a handbasket.

Politics.spanish: El presidente ha declarado el estado de emergencia.
Politics.english: The president has declared a state of emergency.

Politics.spanish: Los ciudadanos votaron en las elecciones de ayer.
Politics.english: The citizens voted in yesterday's elections.

Politics.spanish: La ley fue aprobada por el congreso.
Politics.english: The law was approved by congress.

Politics.spanish: El partido de la oposición se opuso a la medida.
Politics.english: The opposition party opposed the measure.

Politics.spanish: El primer ministro dará un discurso en la conferencia.
Politics.english: The prime minister will give a speech at the conference.

Politics.spanish: El escándalo político sacudió al gobierno.
Politics.english: The political scandal shook the government.

Politics.spanish: Los diplomáticos están negociando un acuerdo comercial.
Politics.english: The diplomats are negotiating a trade agreement.

Politics.spanish: Es nuestra obligación participar en el proceso democrático.
Politics.english: It is our obligation to participate in the democratic process.

Politics.spanish: El poder ejecutivo administra el país.
Politics.english: The executive branch administers the country.

Politics.spanish: La corrupción ha sido un tema central en la campaña.
Politics.english: Corruption has been a central theme in the campaign.

Politics.spanish: Los manifestantes marcharon hacia el parlamento.
Politics.english: The protestors marched towards the parliament.

Politics.spanish: La nueva ley entrará en vigor el próximo año.
Politics.english: The new law will come into force next year.

Politics.spanish: La política exterior del país es muy importante.
Politics.english: The country's foreign policy is very important.

Politics.spanish: El tribunal falló a favor de los demandantes.
Politics.english: The court ruled in favor of the plaintiffs.

Politics.spanish: El senador propuso una enmienda a la constitución.
Politics.english: The senator proposed an amendment to the constitution.

Law.spanish: El abogado defendió a su cliente en el juicio.
Law.english: The lawyer defended his client in the trial.

Law.spanish: El juez dictó sentencia después de la audiencia.
Law.english: The judge passed sentence after the hearing.

Law.spanish: La fiscalía presentó pruebas en contra del acusado.
Law.english: The prosecution presented evidence against the accused.

Law.spanish: El acusado se declaró inocente de todos los cargos.
Law.english: The accused pleaded not guilty to all charges.

Law.spanish: Es un derecho fundamental tener un juicio justo.
Law.english: It is a fundamental right to have a fair trial.

Law.spanish: La policía está investigando el crimen.
Law.english: The police are investigating the crime.

Law.spanish: El jurado llegó a un veredicto después de deliberar.
Law.english: The jury reached a verdict after deliberating.

Law.spanish: Se firmó un acuerdo legal entre las dos partes.
Law.english: A legal agreement was signed between the two parties.

Law.spanish: La ley fue modificada por el parlamento.
Law.english: The law was modified by the parliament.

Law.spanish: El juez ordenó el arresto del sospechoso.
Law.english: The judge ordered the arrest of the suspect.

Law.spanish: Tengo que comparecer ante un tribunal mañana.
Law.english: I have to appear before a court tomorrow.

Law.spanish: Los testigos dieron su testimonio bajo juramento.
Law.english: The witnesses gave their testimony under oath.

Law.spanish: El acusado apeló la decisión del juez.
Law.english: The defendant appealed the judge's decision.

Law.spanish: La evidencia fue crucial para el caso.
Law.english: The evidence was crucial for the case.

Law.spanish: El caso se cerró por falta de pruebas.
Law.english: The case was closed due to a lack of evidence.
